content.html: @tu_clothing can I ask why all your girls school uniform trousers have fake pockets whilst the boys get real ones? I’m having to buy boys trousers for my daughter which I don’t mind, but what did girls do wrong to have their pockets removed? @letclothesbe
content.value:
@tu_clothing can I ask why all your girls school uniform trousers have fake pockets whilst the boys get real ones? I’m having to buy boys trousers for my daughter which I don’t mind, but what did girls do wrong to have their pockets removed?
@letclothesbe
